title: Is my Udhiya (Qurbani) valid if I cut my hair or clipped nails? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem -JAL
transcript: then the people say okay what about if i'm sinful i three days after the month started i shaved my beard or i cut had a haircut or clipped my nails you're sinful full stop does this impact my does it impact my sacrifice no it does but you're sinful for disobeying and you can you should continue
